website_summaries.verdict: Small glove that will fit beginners well. Includes fun colors in a blue or pink version.
pros: Designed for use with t-balls or baseballs and made to fit really young players
Construction makes it easy to snap the glove opened and closed, which is important for players just learning how to catch a baseball
cons: This is a beginners-only baseball glove

customer_reviews.title: ... glove for my 6 year old kid and is perfect for him
customer_reviews.text: This is the first glove for my 6 year old kid and is perfect for him , is good the quality vs price and my kid can handle it well ( he can open and close his hand easily)
customer_reviews.author: Carlos N.

customer_reviews.title: Not Too Big and Not Too Little
customer_reviews.text: For an eleven inch softball, this glove is just the right fit for a 44 pound female five year old.
customer_reviews.author: Studebaker

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my daughter who is in kindergarten. The glove seems to be well made and will serve it's intended purpose. At this level they don't really need anything more.
customer_reviews.author: jim kenney

customer_reviews.title: Tball glove
customer_reviews.text: Tball for 4 year old. Worked fine. Nice to have a pink one for my daughter. She didn't catch much :) but it worked well for what it's worth.
customer_reviews.author: Peg

customer_reviews.title: Just what our 9yro asked for
customer_reviews.text: Our baby girl is the average nine year old size now. This glove fits her perfectly with a little bit more room to grow.
customer_reviews.author: Lock

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my 7 year old daughter
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my 7 year old daughter. Good price. It's a little stiff at first and hard for tiny hands to use. But once it's broken in, it's fine for a first glove. It's a little league glove, I don't need a $100 professional mitt.
customer_reviews.author: Mark V.

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome glove for a 5 year old, with plenty of grow space. Cool color
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Fits nicely on my seven year old
customer_reviews.text: Fits nicely on my seven year old. Seems like good quality and has been holding up at Little League play.
customer_reviews.author: Tina R

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for price
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old loves this glove! Pretty flexible but we did have to wrap it with a baseball to help loosen it up for his hand good quality for price
customer_reviews.author: Tcrmlm08

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 5 year old!
customer_reviews.text: My son love it. It comes pretty broken in which drastically helps the learning curve. My son is 5 years old but a big kid at 55+ pounds and this fit him perfect and was great for his level of play.
customer_reviews.author: Faceoff4

customer_reviews.title: My little girl has really enjoyed it
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a glove! You can even catch a ball with it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good for catching baseballs
customer_reviews.text: Without this glove, my seven year old would have to field baseballs using a combination of his hands and face, and that wouldd not be a good outcome. Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: El Duderino

customer_reviews.title: Much bit too big for my five year old, ...
customer_reviews.text: Much bit too big for my five year old, who typically wears size seven clothes. Should have just bought two of these:
customer_reviews.author: Sean Crago

customer_reviews.title: It was great quality and I wish I could have kept it ...
customer_reviews.text: I returned this because it was too small for my seven year old but he has very large hands. It was great quality and I wish I could have kept it because I thought it was a great deal for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Its a glove for kids kept simple
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good beginners glove. You will need to work with your child to brake it in, but that is normal fare with any new glove.
customer_reviews.author: argo7t3

customer_reviews.title: Great glove!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great glove for my very petite almost-8-year-old daughter. We had quite a hard time finding a 10-inch glove and this one is excellent for a really good price. It comes still needing a bit of working in, but loose enough to start playing. Overall, an excellent glove at an excellent price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 10" Glove!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 5 year old daughter! Very flexible and nice quality. She loves the pink!
customer_reviews.author: JBG

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Great price and quality. I purchased 2 of these for my 9 yr old daughters. The gloves are a perfect fit and super cute color.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my 7 year old, he loves it. I was happy to find a good quality right handed Mitt for a good price
customer_reviews.author: Krista Boone

customer_reviews.title: Great Fitting Glove
customer_reviews.text: This glove was perfect for 6 yr old and Tball. We will use for Baseball next year too! Held up well this season.
customer_reviews.author: CJS

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping. Product description was accurate. my son ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Product description was accurate. my son loves his glove! i will have to order another glove for left hand throw.
customer_reviews.author: raindance

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect fit for my 10 year old girl. sturdy and flexible.
customer_reviews.author: EC

customer_reviews.title: Other than that it works and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit hard to close. Other than that it works and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: A. Danforth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves it! That's all the review I need!
customer_reviews.author: BT

customer_reviews.title: Great second glove
customer_reviews.text: This is a great glove to transition from the typical small t-ball or first glove. Six year old boy fits him great. Softer than his old glove.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was broken in easily and fit my daughters hand just right.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 3 years old nephew/godson. Very highly recommended. Great quality glove.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is comfortable and perfect for younger players. Seven year old girl loves the color
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Keefe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My boy loves playing Tball with his mitt. It seems to be of durable quality,
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great glove for a 4-7 year old. Comes already broken in!
customer_reviews.author: J. Pollard

customer_reviews.title: Great starter glove
customer_reviews.text: Nice first glove for our 5 year old daughter. She's excited to begin T-ball now for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Arizona Sportsman

customer_reviews.title: Value and quality
customer_reviews.text: Really great deal on a nice little glove, my grandson has not put it down.
customer_reviews.author: Richard E. Heaton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect glove for 5 year old
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, especially for the price. Looks great!! Perfect fit for my 5 year old and he loves it! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kris10 C

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner glove for my daughter.  And can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great beginner glove for my daughter. And can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Mallory B.

customer_reviews.title: What You Would Expect
customer_reviews.text: Nice, medium-quality gloves at a medium-quality price, which is exactly what we were looking for. They fit well fora 3-7 year old kid.
customer_reviews.author: bnic

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a good all purpose glove for any position for a starter. We have enjoyed it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits my 5 year old daughter well and perfect for her first year of t-ball
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 5 year old daughter well and perfect for her first year of t-ball. Pink is not as bright as shown in the picture, but it works fine for us!
customer_reviews.author: MerMer

customer_reviews.title: Good mitt, good colors
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the mitt. Fits well and the colors are great!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Yamner

customer_reviews.title: Milo's first
customer_reviews.text: 3 year old grandson received this for his birthday and is playing T-Ball in Japan!! He loves it and so did mom and dad.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Cook

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This glove works perfectly for my 6 year old daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Good Glove
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it for his TBall league. Broke in quickly and fits his 4 yr old hands good. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Knox

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Held up during my 4 year old's t-ball saeson. Hoping to use again next season.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Eisenbraun

customer_reviews.title: Nice little glove for a little guy
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves it too. Nice little glove for a little guy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old Son is able to catch the ball much effiecintly with the gloves
customer_reviews.author: Ben W

product_meta.title: Wilson A200 10" Tee Ball Glove, Black/Blue - Right Hand Throw
product_meta.description: The Wilson A200 series is designed for the beginner level player ages 7 and under. This T-ball glove makes for the perfect first glove for any youth ball player.
feature_bullets: Right Hand Throw; Worn on Left Hand

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
